#### Overview

The [Sentinel-2 Level 1B](https://sentinel.esa.int/web/sentinel/user-guides/sentinel-2-msi/product-types/level-1b){target='_blank'} product provides radiometrically corrected imagery in Top-Of-Atmosphere (TOA) radiance values and in sensor geometry. Additionally, this product includes the refined geometric model which is used to generate the Level 1C product.
